comment: A subspace of a complete metric space is complete iff it is closed in the parent space. Theorem 1.4-7 of [Kreyszig] p. 30. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 9-Oct-2022.)
